snippet: Following Rick Santorum's sweep in Tuesday's three contests, Jeff Zeleny looks at Rick Santorum's new momentum, Nicholas Confessore reports on Foster Friess, the lead donor to Santorum's "super PAC", and Ashley Parker reports from Denver as Mitt...
abstract: Following Rick Santorum's sweep in Tuesday's three contests, Jeff Zeleny looks at Rick Santorum's new momentum, Nicholas Confessore reports on Foster Friess, the lead donor to Santorum's "super PAC", and Ashley Parker reports from Denver as Mitt Romney plans his offensive.
lead_paragraph: Following Rick Santorum's sweep in Tuesday's three contests, Jeff Zeleny looks at Rick Santorum's new momentum, Nicholas Confessore reports on Foster Friess, the lead donor to Santorum's "super PAC", and Ashley Parker reports from Denver as Mitt Romney plans his offensive.
